trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Menu" /> 内某个可选择的项。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>，这意味着其标头和对象的集合可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> 类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> can have submenus.
The submenu of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is made up of the objects within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
It is common for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> to contain other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects to create nested submenus.
trans-unit.target: 很常见的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>以包含其他<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象以创建嵌套子菜单。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> can have one of several functions:
It can be selected to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择它来调用命令。

trans-unit.source: It can be a separator for other menu items.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是其他菜单项的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: It can be a header for a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是子菜单的标头。

trans-unit.source: It can be checked or unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是选中或取消选中。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>通过<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>，堆栈面板的默认值将应用并且该项会居中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event, so if you attach an event handler to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, your handler will never be called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>句柄<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>事件，因此，如果附加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>，永远不会调用你的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To add your own handler, subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> event or subscribe to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加你自己的处理程序，订阅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>事件或订阅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the MenuItem Control
To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>控件，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于状态<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>，请参阅[菜单样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>控件的默认模板，并通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> to manipulate text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>操作中的文本<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects that use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a menu item is checked.
Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked" /> routed event.
Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event does not occur if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click>事件不会发生如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>包含子菜单。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> to manipulate text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>操作中的文本<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects that use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click" /> routed event.
This event corresponds to a left mouse button click.
trans-unit.target: 此事件对应于按钮单击鼠标左键。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与菜单项关联的命令。

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 关联的命令。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
This property is used to associate a command with a particular <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于将命令关联与特定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example associates the **Copy** command with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将**复制**命令<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>并自动提供的输入的笔势文本**Ctrl + C**。

trans-unit.source: The example does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> property, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is "Copy" at run time.
trans-unit.target: 该示例不会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>属性，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>是在运行时的"复制"。

trans-unit.source: You can specify another header for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> if you want it to be different.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定另一个标头<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>如果你希望不同。

trans-unit.source: For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将绑定到所需命令的信息，请参阅[命令添加到 MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370)。

trans-unit.source: A command is raised when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is clicked—just after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发命令时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>单击-紧后面<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities:
trans-unit.target: 根据以下优先级元素上引发的命令：

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, that element is used.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
The focus target of the main window that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that was clicked.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following examples show how to use the command property to associate commands with menu items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用命令属性以将命令与菜单项相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要传递给 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 属性的参数。

trans-unit.source: The parameter to pass to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 属性的参数。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandParameter" /> dependency property.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the target element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其上引发指定命令的目标元素。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to raise the specified command.
trans-unit.target: 在其上引发指定命令的元素。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> property specifies the element where the command occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A>属性指定该命令的出现位置的元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A> is not set, the element that has keyboard focus will receive the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget%2A>未设置，具有键盘焦点的元素将接收命令。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.CommandTarget" /> dependency property.
Creates or identifies the element used to display a specified item.
trans-unit.target: 创建或标识用于显示指定项的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element used to display a specified item.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示指定项的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件是否支持滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>其样式和具有自定义键盘滚动行为，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>应返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon that appears in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 中的图标。

trans-unit.source: The icon that appears in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 中的图标。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
Many <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> controls have more than just text in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> elements.
trans-unit.target: 许多<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>控件具有多个不仅仅是文本<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>元素。

trans-unit.source: Often there are icons, check marks, accelerators, and arrows to indicate submenus.
trans-unit.target: 通常有图标、 复选标记，加速键和箭头以指示子菜单。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example creates a menu item with an icon.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建带有一个图标的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Icon" /> dependency property.
Sets the text describing an input gesture that will call the command tied to the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 设置文本，以描述将调用与指定项关联的命令的输入笔势。

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the input gesture, such as **Ctrl+C** for the **Copy** command.
trans-unit.target: 例如描述输入的笔势的文本**Ctrl + C**为**复制**命令。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
This property does not associate the input gesture with the menu item; it simply adds text to the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不将输入的笔势关联与菜单项;只需将文本添加到菜单项。

trans-unit.source: The application must handle the user's input to carry out the action.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须处理用户的输入才能执行操作。

trans-unit.source: For information on how to associate a command with a menu item, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将命令与菜单项关联的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Command%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following examples show how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.InputGestureText%2A> property to assign keyboard shortcuts text to menu items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.InputGestureText%2A>要分配给菜单项的键盘快捷方式文本属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.InputGestureText" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> can be checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示是否可选中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the menu item can be checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选中菜单项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to make <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> controls that are checked when a user clicks them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>当用户单击的控件检查。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsCheckable" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示是否选中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果选中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked%2A> property can be used to place a check mark in front of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked%2A>属性可以用于选中的菜单项的前面。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> property is <see langword="true" /> for the current menu item.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前菜单项的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> 属性是否为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> can be selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />可选定; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示是否突出显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is highlighted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果突出显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsHighlighted%2A>属性具有的受保护的资源库。

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见 [.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to determine whether a menu item is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何确定是否将突出显示菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsHighlighted" /> dependency property.
Specified item.
Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own <c>ItemContainer</c>.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定项是否是（或者是否可以作为）自己的 <c>ItemContainer</c>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is its own <c>ItemContainer</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项是自己的 <c>ItemContainer</c>，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示是否按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A> property has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A>属性具有的受保护的资源库。

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见 [.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A> property in a menu item style.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed%2A>中菜单项样式属性。

trans-unit.source: When the menu item is pressed, the style of its foreground, text size, and text style change.
trans-unit.target: 在按菜单项时，其前景、 文本大小和文本样式更改的样式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsPressed" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the submenu of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is open.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否打开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的子菜单。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the submenu of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is open; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的子菜单，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen%2A> is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and its subtree.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen%2A>设置为`true`，鼠标捕获设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>及其子树。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The following example shows how to open a submenu of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何打开一个菜单的子<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> called `fileMenu` contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> called `recentFiles` that has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>调用`fileMenu`包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>调用`recentFiles`包含子菜单。

trans-unit.source: When `fileMenu` is opened, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened> event is raised and the `FileMenu_Opened` event handler opens the submenu of `recentFiles`.
trans-unit.target: 当`fileMenu`打开时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened>引发事件和`FileMenu_Opened`事件处理程序将打开的子菜单`recentFiles`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> dependency property.
Gets whether a menu suspends animations on its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取菜单是否对其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 控件挂起动画。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the menu should suspend animations on its popup; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单应对其弹出菜单挂起动画，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSuspendingPopupAnimation" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the custom logic for choosing a template used to display each item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于选择用来显示每个项的模板的自定义逻辑。

trans-unit.source: A custom object that provides logic and returns an item container.
trans-unit.target: 一个自定义对象，它提供逻辑并返回一个项容器。

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplateSelector> to choose different item containers if the items in your collection are the same type and you need to provide custom logic to choose the item container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplateSelector>选择不同的项容器，如果你的集合中的项具有相同的类型，并且你需要提供自定义逻辑，以选择项容器。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.ItemContainerTemplateSelector" /> dependency property.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed" /> event.
Responds when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> for this control is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此控件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> 时响应。

trans-unit.source: Called when the template's tree is generated.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked" /> event.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> property becomes <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> 属性变为 <see langword="true" /> 时调用。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Checked>通过调用的事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnChecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Called when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is clicked and raises a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 并引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> 事件时调用。

trans-unit.source: If you inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, be sure to call the base class to get the following behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果从继承<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>，一定要调用基类的类，以获取以下行为。

trans-unit.source: Toggling of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked%2A> property.
Focus being set to the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点设置到的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Automation invoke event.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Click> event.

Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 为此控件提供适当的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" /> 实现，作为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 自动化基础结构的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.GotFocus" /> event.
Announces that the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 宣布键盘焦点位于此元素上。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> event.

Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> and raises an <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.IsInitialized" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" /> 并引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized" /> 事件时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged" /> event.
Called when the focus is no longer on or within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 当焦点不再在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 之上或之内时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged" /> event.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 属性更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter" /> event.
Called whenever the mouse enters a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 每当鼠标进入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave" /> event.
Called whenever the mouse leaves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 每当鼠标离开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
Called when the left mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 在按下鼠标左键时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event.
Called when the left mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: 在释放鼠标左键时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove" /> event.
Called when the mouse is moved over a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标移到菜单项上时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown" /> event.
Called when the right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 在按下鼠标右键时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp" /> event.
Called when the right mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: 在释放鼠标右键时调用。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed" /> event.
Called when the submenu of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的子菜单时调用。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnSubmenuClosed%2A> method.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened" /> event.
Called when the submenu of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在打开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的子菜单时调用。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnSubmenuOpened%2A> method.
The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked" /> event.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> property becomes <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsChecked" /> 属性变为 <see langword="false" /> 时调用。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>通过调用的事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.OnUnchecked(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Old value of the parent of the visual, or null if the visual did not have a parent.
trans-unit.target: 可视菜单项父级的旧值；如果可视菜单项没有父级，则为 null。

trans-unit.source: Called when the parent of the visual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 在可视 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的父级更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: Element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 用来显示指定的项的元素。

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 准备好指定的元素以显示指定的项。

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 元素的准备工作可能涉及应用样式、 设置的绑定，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the role of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的角色。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole" /> values.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelItem" />.
The value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> depends on the relationship to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> and other <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A>取决于与关系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>和其他<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role" /> dependency property.

Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> in a menu.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于更改的样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>菜单中。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.SeparatorStyleKey**}`"`/>
The following example shows how to use this property to style a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性设置为样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>。

trans-unit.source: Container to which the style will be applied.
Item to which the container belongs.
Used to determine whether to apply a style to the item container.
trans-unit.target: 用于确定是否对项容器应用样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Separator" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the submenu in which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is located should not close when this item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时，该项所在的子菜单不应关闭。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the submenu in which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is located should not close when this item is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在单击此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时，该项所在的子菜单不应关闭，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.StaysOpenOnClick%2A> property to create an item in a submenu that does not close when the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.StaysOpenOnClick%2A>属性来创建不会关闭时单击项的子菜单中的项目。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.StaysOpenOnClick" /> dependency property.
Occurs when the state of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> property changes to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> 属性的状态更改为 <see langword="false" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following examples demonstrate calling and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用和处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuClosed" /> routed event.
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 获取当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为子菜单标头时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为子菜单标头时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于更改的样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.SubmenuHeaderTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 获取当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为子菜单时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为子菜单时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于更改的样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.SubmenuItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.SubmenuItemTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Occurs when the state of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> property changes to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.IsSubmenuOpen" /> 属性的状态更改为 <see langword="true" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following examples demonstrate calling and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用和处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.SubmenuOpened" /> routed event.
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a top-level menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为顶级菜单标头时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is a header of a top-level menu.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为顶级菜单标头时应用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于更改的样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.TopLevelHeaderTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Gets the resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when it is a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that can invoke commands.
trans-unit.target: 获取当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为可调用命令的顶级 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时应用于它的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The resource key for a style applied to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> when it is a top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> that can invoke commands.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 为可调用命令的顶级 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时应用于它的样式的资源键。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于更改的样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Role%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItemRole.TopLevelItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
<*object* *property*={ **MenuItem.TopLevelItemTemplateKey**}`"`/>
Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> is unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 在未选中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
Identifier field
Routing strategy
Bubbling
Delegate
The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.Unchecked" /> routed event.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示菜单是根据基础集合中项的类型还是一些其他的启发方法来选择不同的项容器的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> the menu selects different item containers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 下拉菜单中选择不同的项容器，为<see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是很有用，如果你想要创建菜单通过绑定到集合。

trans-unit.source: The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 项容器是显示集合中的对象的用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> property to true and create an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> for each type of object in your collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要绑定到集合以创建包含菜单<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>对象，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A>属性为 true，创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>为每个类型的集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> must contain either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem.UsesItemContainerTemplate" /> dependency property.
